attributes.action: Sto British Jihadis from returning to the UK
attributes.additional_details:
The government is not going to stop British Citizens who have chosen to leave UK to fight for ISIS. They cut peoples heads off, rape, torture and kill if you don't believe the same as them.  The government will not take their passports away if they only have a british passport.
They will effectively be able to come back here and either enjoy our freedoms or try to take them away.
Their choice to go and fight now we must pressure the government to stop them returning, even if it makes them stateless,,  Their doing not ours. Must act now before its too late. They have betrayed British values.
